name: Droki
speed: 30 ft. (60 ft. with boots of speed)

abilities.name: Insanity.
abilities.description: Droki has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting.
abilities.description:
Droki's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: minor illusion
1/day each: darkness, fear, shatter

abilities.name: Sneak Attack
abilities.description: Droki deals an extra 7 (2d6) damage when he hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage ont he attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Droki that isn't incapacitated and Droki doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

abilities.name: Magic Resistance.
abilities.description: The derro has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

abilities.name: Sunlight Sensitivity.
abilities.description: While in sunlight, the derro has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.
